abstract: Bank of America said it was cooperating with a Justice Department investigation into bidding practices in the municipal bond business in exchange for leniency.
snippet: Bank of America said it was cooperating with a Justice Department investigation into bidding practices in the municipal bond business in exchange for leniency.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said yesterday that it was cooperating with a Justice Department investigation into bidding practices in the municipal bond business in exchange for leniency.

headline.main: U.S. Inquiry on Bonds at Big Bank
headline.print_headline: U.S. Inquiry On Bonds At Big Bank
